                          java.lang.String armyNumber)

        Parameters:
        source - country move armies from
        target - country move armies to
        armyNumber - number of moved armies

      • nextPlayer

        public void nextPlayer()
        Set current player to the next one according in round robin fashion If a new round starts from the next player, send ROUND_ROBIN STATE to view Considerations: 1. When allocate armies at start up phaseNumber, when the last player finishes army allocation, this method tells view round robin starts; 2. In round robin, when the last player finishes fortification phaseNumber, this method tells view round robin starts again, meanwhile change current player to the first player.

      • allocateArmy

        Parameters:
